title: Work Experience
text:
2021 - Present
Working as a BI developer to deliver insights to internal programme teams.
Tools used: - Tableau - SQL - Python - Azure



2016 - 2021
Senior data engineer focused on building a regulatory platform in SAS which we later migrated to Google Cloud.
Tools used: - Tableau - SQL - SAS - Google cloud - Shell scripting - Hadoop

title: About
text:
I am a data engineer and BI developer working for the NHS. My current focus is bringing software engineering principles to data visualisation. Previously I worked as a data engineer in on-prem to cloud migration projects.



See ‘My Work’ section for software i have used.
